effect.minecraft.absorption.description: Grants temporary extra maximum health in the form of golden hearts which cannot be regenerated once lost.
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.description: You feel an evil presence watching you...
effect.minecraft.darkness.description: Causes vision to temporarily fade in and out.
effect.minecraft.dolphins_grace.descript: Drastically increases swimming speed. Effect given by dolphins.
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.descrip: Grants immunity to fire and lava damage.
effect.minecraft.glowing.description: Marks affected entities with a glowing outline, allowing them to be seen through blocks.
effect.minecraft.health_boost.descriptio: Increases maximum health - higher levels give more health.
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: Gives discounts on villager trades, and makes villagers gift the player various items depending on their profession.
effect.minecraft.invisibility.descriptio: Makes the user invisible and reduces their detection range. Held or worn items will still be visible.
effect.minecraft.jump_boost.description: Increases jump height and reduces fall damage.
effect.minecraft.luck.description: Increases the quality and amount of loot obtained from various sources.
effect.minecraft.nausea.description: Wobbles and warps the screen. (This effect can be toned down in the accessibility settings)
effect.minecraft.night_vision.descriptio: Improves vision in dark areas and underwater.
effect.minecraft.poison.description: Inflicts non-lethal damage over time. Does not affect undead.
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.descriptio: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage.
effect.minecraft.slowness.description: Decreases walking speed and field of view.
effect.minecraft.speed.description: Increases walking speed and field of view.
effect.minecraft.unluck.description: Decreases the quality and amount of loot obtained from various sources.
effect.minecraft.water_breathing.descrip: Prevents your underwater air supply from running out.
effect.atmospheric.gelled.description: Extinguishes fire initially, slightly increases life regen, and slightly reduces fire damage taken. If the effect is gained again while still active, the user will be poisoned.
effect.atmospheric.persistence.descripti: Increases movement speed based on how empty a player's food bar is.
effect.atmospheric.relief.description: If incoming damage is greater than or equal to the effect level the user is healed; healing received is equal to the effect level.
effect.atmospheric.spitting.description: While this effect is active the user will rapidly spit out seeds that can knock back and damage mobs.
effect.atmospheric.worsening.description: If incoming damage is greater than or equal to the effect level the user is damaged; damage received is equal to the effect level.
effect.autumnity.extension.description: Any effects gained while the user has this effect gain an additional 30 seconds.
effect.autumnity.foul_taste.description: The next food item eaten removes the effect but replenishes 50% more hunger points than normal.
effect.buzzier_bees.sunny.description: Simulates sunlight. Phantoms won't attack mobs that have the effect, bees won't sleep if they have the effect, undead that have the effect will burn.
effect.eidolon.anchored.description: Prevents the affected entity from being teleported by certain effects.
effect.eidolon.chilled.description: Disables passive health regeneration and makes ever food not provide any hunger points.
effect.environmental.panic.description: Increases movement speed based on how low a player's health is.
effect.environmental.serenity.descriptio: Stops hostile mobs from spawning in a 32x32x8 radius.
effect.farmersdelight.comfort.descriptio: Grants passive health regeneration that's active even when the user's food bar isn't full.
effect.farmersdelight.nourishment.descri: Prevents players from losing hunger or saturation from any source other than replenishing health points.
effect.farmersrespite.caffeinated.descri: Increases the target's walk and attack speed.
effect.neapolitan.agility.description: Allows climbing on all blocks as if they have invisible ladders on them.
effect.neapolitan.berserking.description: Killing mobs raises the effect by 1 level each time, each level grants extra strength and defense.
effect.neapolitan.harmony.description: Makes most hostile mobs run away from the user.
effect.neapolitan.slipping.description: Causes the affected to uncontrollably slip around in random directions.
effect.neapolitan.sugar_rush.description: Increases movement speed for the first three quarters of the effect duration, decreases it for the last quarter.
effect.neapolitan.vanilla_scent.descript: Blocks all incoming effects, whether they're beneficial or harmful.
effect.savage_and_ravage.weight.descript: Causes the affected to lose the ability to jump and decreases their movement speed.
effect.upgrade_aquatic.insomnia.descript: Increases the insomnia timer by 1 day per effect level, causing phantoms to spawn. Turns Phantoms into Flares, and kills Flares.
effect.upgrade_aquatic.repellence.descri: Inflicts poison on mobs that make contact with the user.
effect.upgrade_aquatic.restfulness.descr: Decreases the insomnia timer by 1 day per effect level, decreasing Phantom spawn chance. Turns Flares into Phantoms, and kills Phantoms.
effect.upgrade_aquatic.vibing.descriptio: Grants the regeneration effect to mobs that make contact with the user.
effect.windswept.thorns.description: Damages any mob or player who attacks the player under this effect.
effect.cofh_core.wrenched.description: Makes the inflicted constantly turn 40Â° clockwise every second.
effect.cofh_core.clarity.description: Increases the amount of experience gained by 40% per level.
effect.cofh_core.chilled.description: Reduces movement speed by 30% and attack damage by 1.5 per level.
effect.endersdelight.phasing.description: Causes the affected to randomly teleport around.
effect.oreganized.stunning.description: Periodically paralyzes the affected at random intervals.
effect.brewinandchewin.tipsy.description: Increases in level every time something that grants the effect is consumed. Causes various negative effects the higher its level is.
effect.brewinandchewin.sweet_heart.descr: Increases amount of health gained from incoming healing effects.
effect.respiteful.vitality.description: Strengthens healing effects and grants resistance to the Wither effect.
effect.respiteful.tenacity.description: Increases armour toughness and knockback resistance.
effect.respiteful.maturity.description: Grants immunity to harmful food effects and increases saturation gained from eating food.
